contentrichtext.text: '''John Schneider''' may refer to: *[[John Schneider (American football)]] (born 1894), American football player *[[John Schneider (American football executive)]], Seattle Seahawks executive *[[John Schneider (screen actor)]] (born 1960), actor (''The Dukes of Hazzard'' and ''Smallville'') and country music artist *[[John Schneider (producer)]] (born 1962), American film producer *[[John Schneider (guitarist)]] (born 1950), American classical music guitarist *[[John Schneider (racing driver)]], American racing driver *[[John Schneider (stage actor)]], Milwaukee-based theatre artist *[[John A. Schneider]] (born 1926), president of the CBS Television Network *[[John R. Schneider]] (born 1937), former American politician *[[John Schneider, Jr.]] (1918â€“1985), American politician {{hndis|Schneider, John}}
